CEO message

Eng. Mahmood Al Bastaki CEO - Dubai Trade
Welcome to our 8th cycle of the E-Services Excellence Award. Dubai Trade since its inception is committed to facilitate and improve the entire end-to-end supply chain processes by delivering online services with the challenge of e-transformation.
READ MORE

about us

The E-Services Excellence Award is an annual award ceremony organized by Dubai Trade in order to reward and recognize the best performers in e-Services adoption on the Dubai Trade portal. The ESEA features a new theme every year which targets a particular e-service with the main aim of encouraging the conversion to e-services, and award the highest performers.
READ MORE

Sponsorship benefits

There are three types of sponsorship packages; Platinum, Gold, and Silver.
Benefits are granted pre the event, at event and post the event.
Pre Event Packages At Event Packages Post Event Packages
READ MORE

Media partners and supporters

The 8th ESEA is supported by DP World , Jafza, Dubai Customs, Ministry of Economy, Dubai Smart Government, Dubai Exports, the Chartered Institute of Trade and Transport (CILT) and the Supply Chain & Logistics Group (SCLG) and the Annual Investement Meeting (AIM).
READ MORE

Judging Panel

The 8th ESEA is supported by DP World , Jafza, Dubai Customs, Ministry of Economy, Dubai Smart Government, Dubai Exports, the Chartered Institute of Trade and Transport (CILT) and the Supply Chain & Logistics Group (SCLG) and the Annual Investement Meeting (AIM).
READ MORE
